roleset.name: having a heartbeat above normal range, characterized by/suffering from tachycardia
roleset.note: TACHYCARDIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from tachycardic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Good progress overall , he is tolerating a soft diet , some issues with pain but well managed with one dose of Fentanyl , he is not tachycardic any more , mild distention .
